original_text: So he took him, and brought him to the chief captain, and said, Paul the prisoner called me unto him, and prayed me to bring this young man unto thee, who hath something to say unto thee.
korean_text: 천부장에게로 데리고 가서 이르되 죄수 바울이 나를 불러 이 청년이 당신께 할 말이 있다 하여 데리고 가기를 청하더이다 하매

sentences.original_text: and brought him to the chief captain
Paul the prisoner called me unto him
and prayed me to bring this young man unto thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 청년을 당신께 데려오도록 부탁했습니다

sentences.original_text: who hath something to say unto thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신께 할 말이 있는 사람입니다
